Room.Name: West Hafnia Boulevard
Room.ShortDescription: You are on a wide boulevard which runs from the west gate to the east gate.
Room.LongDescription: The beautiful mountain city of Hafnia is small, but you must remember it was rebuilt after the war with the dragons and trolls. Long ago, Hafnia was much larger but most of it was crushed during the wars. Some say there are still portions of the old city deep underground, and that it may be possible to recover some of the valuables that still be down there.
